price: Bagi orang-orang yang berbuat baik, ada pahala yang terbaik (surga) dan tambahannya (kenikmatan melihat Allah). Dan wajah mereka tidak ditutupi debu hitam dan tidak (pula) dalam kehinaan. Mereka itulah penghuni surga, mereka kekal di dalamnya.
arabic: ۞ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ وَزِيَادَةٞۖ وَلَا يَرۡهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمۡ قَتَرٞ وَلَا ذِلَّةٌۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna aḥsanū al-ḥus'nā waziyādatun walā yarhaqu wujūhahum qatarun walā dhillatun ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
